title: What is this icon I got out of nowhere? o.O
body:
I browsed my summoner icons and "bam" I saw this new icon with a gandalf poro on it (the Icon that I have here,look at my profile) and it just randomly appeared there,me having no idea how as I didn't do anything.
Did I click on something while snowdown showdown was still active? it is xmas-sy.

replies.body:
I checked your account out and it looks like you received the Poro King Icon! You earned this by playing at least one Poro King match while Snowdown was happening.

If you have any questions, please let me know. ^.^
You got that icon from playing a Poro King game during [Snowdown ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016)2016.
